actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill relating to the withholding of income or employment taxes imposed by certain cities on the compensation of Federal employees.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into an agreement, regarding the withholding of city income or employment taxes, within 120 days of a request for agreement by the proper city official. Forbids Federal agencies from accepting compensation from a city for services of withholding tax. Defines "city" to mean only a city which is incorporated under State law.

titles.title: A bill relating to the withholding of income or employment taxes imposed by certain cities on the compensation of Federal employees.
